articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: 2024 Bahrain F1 test: Leclerc fastest from Russell on final day - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Charles Leclerc and Ferrari ended the third day of Bahrain winter testing on top as Formula 1's 2024 pre-season came to a close.
articles.content:
Leclerc's team-mate Carlos Sainz had led the final morning session from Red Bull's Sergio Perez before running was interrupted by a broken drain cover for the second day in a row.
Because repairs ha… [+4898 chars]

articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Hamilton: Ferrari F1 move wouldn't have happened without Vasseur - Autosport
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has confirmed that his move to the Ferrari Formula 1 team in 2025 wouldn’t have happened without the presence of team principal Fred Vasseur.
articles.content: Hamilton drove for the Frenchmans ASM F3 team in 2005, winning the European title. The following year he graduated to GP2 with Vasseurs rebranded ART GP outfit, again winning the championship, before… [+4116 chars]
